bug.short_desc: Enhance documentation of changeSelection event for data bound selections

long_desc.thetext: The "changeSelection" event of a virtual widget like the VirtualTree doesn't fire.
Are you referring to qx.ui.treevirtual.TreeVirtual here?
That's what I thought. Reassigning to Martin.

Hello Katja, this is the intended behavior. Please take a look at bug #5582 to see more details. Its the same for the list which is the topic in the related bug. If you have further questions, feel free to get in touch with me. Best, Martin

Hello Martin,
ok, I understand it now but it isn't very intuitive. Thus that should definetely be documented in detail in the api doc to avoid confusion. At least something like "changeSelection will only be fired if the reference to the array holding the seleced items changes. If you are looking for the event triggered when an item of the selection changes, use this.getSelection().addListener("change", handler) instead."
At the getSelection() method there should also be something like "Use this.getSelection().addListener("change", handler) to listen to the event triggered when an item of the selection changes."
Thanks Katja
